entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -32.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 09:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -32.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
